attributes.action: Create a secular state for the UK and ban all public funding for faith-based organisations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We live in the 21st Century, in a modern Britain.  It is time we separated Church and State and prevented religious individuals, who are a minority, from benefiting disproportionately from the majority's taxes. The public should not fund religion and the Government should make provision for all of us equally. There is no place for Church in Politics.
